install.name: DOCman Lister
install.author: Joomlatools
install.copyright: This extension is released under the GNU/GPL License
install.description: Show a list of popular/latest documents

param.name: show_icon
param.label: Show icon
param.description: Display a generic icon near the name of the document, using the theme defined?

param.name: show_counter
param.label: Show counter
param.description: Display the number of downloads after the download name?

param.name: show_category
param.label: Show category
param.description: Display the category of the document after the download name?

param.name: link_type
param.label: Link type
param.description: What sort of links are generated?

param.name: show_list
param.label: Show as list
param.description: Show the output using a list ( ul tag )?

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: text_pfx
param.label: Text prefix
param.description: Some text to be included before the list (optional)

param.name: text_sfx
param.label: Text Suffix
param.description: Some text to be included after the list (optional)

param.name: limits
param.label: Limit
param.description: Maximum number of downloads to display ( use 0 or blank for unlimited ).

param.name: cat_limit
param.label: Category limit
param.description: Leave blank to use all categories, or enter a specific DOCman category ID here ( enter multiple categories seperated by commas ).

param.name: order_by
param.label: Order by
param.description: How do you want to order the results?

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module
